A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a disgrace to the Skywalker saga. There are so many things wrong with this movie it's hard narrow it down but I can try. The absolute desecration of Luke Skywalker. The Casino Plot has no impact on the movie and is a waste of time. Forced social justice messages\, i.e. Men are bad and are always mansplaining\, dont eat animals\, the jedi were bad because not everyone could be a jedi\, the force is no longer special\, The Story drags and the acting is sub par. I felt like I was watching the prequels. This movie is the anti - Empire Strikes Back.
